mapper.insert: insert into message_record (business_id, business_type, topic, msg_status, msg_text, create_time) values (#{businessId}, #{businessType}, #{topic}, #{msgStatus}, #{msgText}, #{createTime});
mapper.select:
select
from message_record where msg_status < 2 and create_time < #{startDate} and retries_number < #{reties} order by create_time asc
